nodes.text: Sutloo's Trading Post was a small store about 3 kilometers outside of Storrd Township. It was run by an old settler named Sutloo.

It was built of wood and was constructed in a large blue tree above the jungle floor. A large circuitous staircase wound around the tree and led to a large porch with chair and tables. The ground around the base of the tree was cleared to provide landing spaces for freighters or airspeeders.
It stocked basic survival gear, and was mostly used by settlers or smugglers who had camps in the jungle and didn't want to make a high profile visit into town for supplies.
Tern Ashandrik had an account setup at the store by Shesstellek and would frequently send Gorrul Wyke there for supplies.
